review: J'ai reçu mon maillot Coast couleur bleu! C'est une très belle qualité et le fit est parfait! Ready to beach haha!
I love this swimsuit ! It fits perfectly, texture's awesome and color's wonderful. Thank you very much !!!

The first thing you notice when you open the package and touch the fabric for the first time is how soft and unique it is! Clearly they went next level on the materials.

The fit is perfect. People have been asking where I got this bathing suit!! It just looks great. It's a modern sexy alternative to boring swimwear.

Oh and shipping was blazing fast.


Out with the board shorts! Time for some style.


I highly recommend to anyone. I mean everyone has a bathing suit right?

Give it a try! (Prices are way under the competition)
Five stars to these guys. Fantastic beachwear! My husband LOVES his shorts!!
This is the best swimwear I’ve ever worn! Seriously comfortable. WOW!
Perfect fit… very comfortable, excellent quality and good value for price.
